alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:40PM CST until February 17 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTY... At 740 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbiana, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Calera, Childersburg, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Harpersville, Lay Lake, Shelby, Beeswax Creek Park, Shelby Shores, Gaston Steam Plant and Kelley Branch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
